title: Ahsan Furqan
content:
I have had the pleasure of working alongside hammad for a year at Siliconplex. He is an exceptional Python/Django with an impressive ability to deliver high-quality solutions.
Hammad brings a deep understanding of web development technologies and consistently goes above and beyond in tackling complex challenges.
I wholeheartedly recommend Hammad to anyone seeking a highly skilled and reliable Python/Django developer. He would be a valuable asset to any team or project.

title: Saqib Najam
content: I have been supervising Hammad for quite some time. I can say that he is a hardworking and professional individual. He tends to write clean code and follow best practices to the best of his abilities to deliver quality solutions to critical problems.

title: Qamar Abbas
content: Hammad has proven to be a competent and valuable team member. He has excellent skills in Django and Django Rest Framework. He always tends delivers high-quality code on time with great and professional work ethics. During my time with him, he worked on a diverse set of technologies, which is a sign of a good developer. Definitely recommend him for any web development project which requires Django expertise and creativity.

title: Chander Harwani
content: Hammad has great technical knowledge, specially he is expert in Python. I also got to learn a lot about docker, gitflow and streamlit from Hammad, he is great leader to work with!

title: Muhammad Hammad
content: His knowledge in overall Python stack is remarkable, specifically in Django framework. We both have worked on a project in Pumpjack Dataworks and there he proved to be a worthy teammate.

title: Zain-ul-Abidin
content: He is honestly good at handling the backend APIs in Node/Express. He had been a great support to the team. Nice working with you and looking forward to more opportunities to work together.

title: Muhammad Taha Hassan
content: His Django development skills are excellent. Not only he knows the framework inside out but can develop fully functional backend in it. We were working on a Final Year Project together as students and that was when he demonstrated his strong skills.in python programming and django development.
